description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Austin, United States. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Golfers Paradise in Austin Hill Country with Four Championship Courses, Nine Restaurants & Spa
hotels.description: Treat the family to an elegant retreat in the scenic Hill Country of Austin. This resort is a golf lover's paradise, boasting four championship golf courses over an expansive 4,000 acres, earning the resort a wealth of accolades for the sport. Indulge in the finest Texas-inspired cuisine at the nine onsite restaurants and bars, plunge into three pools and a hot tub, or rejuvenate at the world-class Mokara Spa. For adventure seekers, the nearby Barton Creek Habitat Preserve offers miles of hiking trails through unspoiled wilderness.

hotels.title: Charming Austin Mansion Retreat Overlooking Wilderness Preserve w. Restaurants, Day Spa & Pool
hotels.description: Retreat to a haven among the trees with a stay at Hotel Viata, an mansion-style hotel overlooking Austin’s lush Wild Basin Wilderness Preserve. Just a short drive from Austin’s city centre, the hotel is a serene haven, offering moments of peace and quiet surrounded by the forest. Toast to a refreshing happy hour, indulge in delectable Italy-meets-Texas fare at Laurel Restaurant and elevate your relaxation levels with a Spa Viata treatment - from Himalayan stone massages to brightening facials.

seo.title: Hoteles en Austin - Estados Unidos Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Austin, United States con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
